definition: to lose sth abstract but important (courage, authority, one's life etc)/to be bereaved of (one's spouse etc)/to die/disappointed/discouraged

sentences.english: The accident bereaved Jack of his wife.
He never really recovered from the sadness of his wife's death.
sentences.chinese: 他從未真正從喪妻的悲傷中走出來。

sentences.english: We are all old actually are too quickly intelligent too late, my school leader last year mourning wife.
sentences.chinese: 我們都老得太快卻聰明得太遲，我的學長去年喪妻。
